Evaluation: Routine laboratory tests (Hb, INR, pH, bicarbonate, Cr) (if done)
TXA level (collected at the end of bolus and infusion; also collect convenience sample of blood drawn during the first 24 hours after the start of study drug infusion)
Adherence assessment (time ICP is over 20 mmHg over the first 48 hours)
Digit span recall test (All patients 3 years and older)
